rules_text:
Choose target opponent and up to one target spell that player controls. Return that spell to its owner’s hand. Until that player’s next turn, their life total can’t change and they gain protection from everything. All permanents they control phase out. [i](While they’re phased out, they’re treated as though they don’t exist. They phase in before that player untaps during their untap step.)[/i]
Exile Teferi’s Dismissal.
